Minsung

VARSITY

Introduction

Minsung is a South Korean singer-songwriter under ADVANTAGE. He was the leader of the boy group VARSITY under the name Kid and a pre-debut member of Ten-X. He ranked 49th on MIXNINE. He made his solo debut on January 31, 2022.

Jan 5, 2017
